homepage_intro.html: The design office of Theo Ford. Specialising in graphic design, art direction, moving-image and web development. Recent commissions and collaborations include identities for Tesla, adverts for American Apparel, and printed for matter COS.

about_page_intro.html: Theo Ford runs a design office specialising in graphic design, art direction, moving image and web development, currently based in London. His approach is cross disciplinary and collaborative: striving to identify the right balance between playful expression and order, to create original yet long-lasting design solutions.
